1.16.5.1.1.2-1.16.5:
04/08/2023

• Updated the Simplified Chinese translations.
• Added Traditional Chinese translations (thanks junshengxie).
1.16.5.1.1.1-1.16.5:
02/25/2023

• Added two new binding table types: Warped and Crimson.
• Updated the Simplified Chinese translations.
1.16.5.1.1.0-1.16.5:
02/12/2023: Binding Table Update

This is a significant update to the mod and includes the following changes:
• Added a binding table that must now be used to create enchanted books from manuscripts pages.
• Added a reusable empty glue bottle item that is the base of the enchanted book glue recipe.
• Added an alternative enchanted book glue recipe that allows the use of glue bottles that contain 50% or less glue instead of an empty glue bottle.
• Added a config option to disable or enable treasure enchantments from being applied to resulting books. Enabled by default.
• Added a config option to specify the maximum number of enchantments (up to 10) that can be applied to a single book.
• Librarian villagers may sometimes gift village heros with an ancient manuscript.
• The mod now has its own creative tab.
1.16.5.1.0.5-1.16.5:
01/08/2023

• Added an enchantment blacklist system that allows the blocking any and all mod specific enchantments from the enchanted book recipe.
• Fixed an enchantment duplication bug.
• Added Simplified Chinese translations (thanks junshengxie).
1.16.5.1.0.3-1.16.5:
10/01/2022

• Using an enchanted book in the recipe will now add more enchantments to that book (up to 5).
1.16.5.1.0.2-1.16.5:
09/22/2022

• Modified the way vanilla only enchantments are determined.
• Tweaked the enchanted book glue texture.
1.16.5.1.0.1-1.16.5:
09/19/2022

• Increased the default librarian villager trade level to 3 (journeyman).
• Added configuration options for villager and wandering trader trades.

1.19.1.1.6-1.19:
05/29/2024

• Manuscript pages can now be substituted via data packs.
• The binding table now uses Forge tags for certain slots.
• Added sound effects to the binding table when it's active.
• More Forge tags were added to recipes and advancements.
1.19.1.1.5-1.19:
05/10/2024

• Added more chests for manuscripts to be found in.
• More than one manuscript can now be found in chests.
• Witches now drop up to two manuscripts and the chance is increased with looting.
 •Witches no longer drop manuscripts unless killed by the player.
